page.syntax: Window_Title as C = a5_html_editor3([C tabname [,C incoming_html_code [,C default_ext [,L use_toolbars [,C filename ]]]]])
page.description: Opens the HTML Editor and returns the title of the window that was created.
page.example: dim html as C html = file.to_string("C:\Documents\Edit_Help\!--Alpha_Five_Help_Title.htm") a5_html_editor3("Source", html, ".htm", .t., "Title_page.htm")
